page.title: List of The Adventures of Tintin characters

rev.diff:
Line 143: Line 143:
==Mik Kanrokitoff==
==Mik Kanrokitoff==
â
:In French: [[:fr:Mik Ezdanitoff]]
+
Seemingly [[Russia]]n writer for the magazine ''Space Week''. Appears in ''[[Flight 714]]'' and helps Tintin, Captain Haddock and friends escape from the island after Allan and his cohorts set off a plastic explosive charge that stirs up the island's volcano. Has hypnotic power by means of a small antenna and transmitter on the side of his head. Maintains a friendship with an unseen race of space aliens and it is their spaceship that enables Tintin and co. to escape the island.<ref>[http://www.tintinologist.org/guides/characters/k.html Tintin Characters Guide: K<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref>
